channel.title: [525] united pkz [525]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/34pltoi-1.jpg[/img]
Welcome to the united pkz Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.
Information about united pkz: We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new outlook at united pkz. We have just completed of changing from a PK/Spawn server to an Economy pking server. I personally feel that I didn't take the right approach, as I usually do not. As I said, we are taking a step back in the development process and are looking to develop the server more, then re-release. We have over 150 registered users on our forums, as well as reaching a peak of 50 players in-game. We are hosted on an offshore VPS, hosted in the Usa.
United Pkz 525 was a successful server opened in july 2011, we grew rapidly in late july and august becoming the most popular 525 server since Generation-X 525. united pkz is hosted on a Powerful Dedicated server.
Pictures
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/screen6.png[/img]
FEATURES : * Good switches *Fight pits * All Chaotic Wepons * Working Slayer * Full SoulSplit. * Full Pking System * Npc Combat * Fixed Noclipping * New teleports * Fixed Server lagg * Added Anti-Lag System * Fixed Char Glitches. * New Pvp Loots. * Added New Pvp Armours * Added New Royal Crown * Added New Arcane Streamer * Added New Staff of light models * Added New Soul Wars Cape * Added New DONATOR System. * Fully Working Mage system * Added ::item Command all items are free except Pvp items * Added ::setlevel * Added All Chaotic Stats * working Fixed Chaotic Staff * Added Anti-Lag System * Added Anti-Flood System * Added More Donator Commands * Added Donator Zone * 100% working Tormented-demon still in * Added New Contest Updates * No More Bank glitches. * Added Prayer Animations + Gfx’s * Pvp items * Vengance 100% * 100% Hybriding * 100% 1v1 * Magebank * Clan Wars 100% SAFE * Much pvp areas * 100% Bounty hunter with teleports * 5+ Working skills, more to be added! * Alot of players on the right moments * Added New Hp bars * Soul Split GFX * Soul Split Healing * Turmoil REAL GFX & Stat Boosts
[/center]

item.title: [525] united pkz [525]
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Eddie Coder Eddie
item.description:
@Coder_Eddie wrote:

[center]

Welcome to the united pkz Development thread. Please read thouroughly before applying.

Information about united pkz:
We are taking a step back in the private server process and we are taking on a whole new
outlook at united pkz. We have just completed of changing from a PK/Spawn server to an
Economy pking server. I personally feel that I didn’t take the right approach, as I
usually do not. As I said, we are taking a step back in the development process and are
looking to develop the server more, then re-release. We have over 150 registered users on
our forums, as well as reaching a peak of 50 players in-game. We are hosted on an
offshore VPS, hosted in the Usa.

United Pkz 525 was a successful server opened in july 2011, we grew rapidly in late july and august becoming the most popular 525 server since Generation-X 525.
united pkz is hosted on a Powerful Dedicated server.

Pictures

FEATURES :

  • Good switches
    *Fight pits
  • All Chaotic Wepons
  • Working Slayer
  • Full SoulSplit.
  • Full Pking System
  • Npc Combat
  • Fixed Noclipping
  • New teleports
  • Fixed Server lagg
  • Added Anti-Lag System
  • Fixed Char Glitches.
  • New Pvp Loots.
  • Added New Pvp Armours
  • Added New Royal Crown
  • Added New Arcane Streamer
  • Added New Staff of light models
  • Added New Soul Wars Cape
  • Added New DONATOR System.
  • Fully Working Mage system
  • Added ::item Command all items are free except Pvp items
  • Added ::setlevel
  • Added All Chaotic Stats
  • working Fixed Chaotic Staff
  • Added Anti-Lag System
  • Added Anti-Flood System
  • Added More Donator Commands
  • Added Donator Zone
  • 100% working Tormented-demon still in
  • Added New Contest Updates
  • No More Bank glitches.
  • Added Prayer Animations + Gfx’s
  • Pvp items
  • Vengance 100%
  • 100% Hybriding
  • 100% 1v1
  • Magebank
  • Clan Wars 100% SAFE
  • Much pvp areas
  • 100% Bounty hunter with teleports
  • 5+ Working skills, more to be added!
  • Alot of players on the right moments
  • Added New Hp bars
  • Soul Split GFX
  • Soul Split Healing
  • Turmoil REAL GFX & Stat Boosts

[/center]
